targets.query:
from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "state_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "rsrp")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "state_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "rsrq")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "state_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sinr")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "state_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "latitude" or r._field == "longitude")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "state_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gps_altitude" or r._field == "baro_relative_altitude")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "state_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "speed_kmh")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "state_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "satellites")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "state_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "modem_temperature" or r._field == "temperature_celsius")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "state_metrics")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pressure_hpa")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "performance_benchmarks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "upload_mbps" or r._field == "download_mbps")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "performance_benchmarks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "rtt_avg_ms" or r._field == "jitter_ms")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "performance_benchmarks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "packet_loss_pct")

from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "state_metrics")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns:["_time","cell_id","network_type","operator","tracking_area_code","frequency_channel","frequency_band","physical_cell_id"])
  |> group(columns: [])

confirmModal.body: Please confirm to update changed values
confirmModal.title: Confirm update request

elements.title: Auto benchmarks
elements.tooltip: Enable automatic benchmarks during the session

update.code:
if (context.panel.response?.ok) { context.grafana.notifySuccess(['Session', 'Started']); } else { context.grafana.notifyError(['Session', 'Start failed']); }
context.panel.enableSubmit();
update.getPayload:
const auto = context.panel.elements.find((el) => el.id === 'auto_benchmarks');
return { auto_benchmarks: Boolean(auto?.value) };

confirmModal.title: Confirm update request

confirmModal.body: Please confirm to update changed values
confirmModal.title: Confirm update request

confirmModal.body: Please confirm to update changed values
confirmModal.title: Confirm update request

targets.query:
from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ground_wifi")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "rssi_dbm")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
